item.title: Several injured after two private buses and a lorry collides in Gadwal district
item.description:
<![CDATA[A serious road accident occurred on Saturday morning near the Pulluru Toll Plaza in the Undavalli mandal of Jogulamba Gadwal district. The incident involved two private travel buses colliding with a lorry in a series of unfortunate collisions.
Initial reports indicate that the lorry carrying stone was making a U-turn when it struck a travels bus traveling from Hyderabad to Kadapa. The situation escalated as another bus from behind, belonging to Kaveri Travels and en route from Hyderabad to Tiru...]]>
item.author: Pavan Bandari
